name: Templar Secrets
description:
Templar Secrets is a 2D puzzle platformer game concept about a templar finding the secrets of the Catholic Church. This game was made during the Global Game Jam 2016 in Brazil.

Controls:

It's recommended to play using a Xbox controller.

Xbox Controller Left Stick Move and Aim A button Interact with objects and shoot B button Jump and interact with main menu buttons Keyboard WASD Move and Aim Space Shoot, Interact with objects and Activate the Crosshair Credits:

A game concept by:

Eliza Franco

Filipe Mateus

João Ricardo

Lucas Gutierres

Mateus Amaral

Matheus Avellar

Mauricio Leonardo

Thais Dias
